Default Message Notification Level.description: members will receive notifications for all messages by default
members will receive notifications only for messages that @mention them by default

Explicit Content Filter Level.description: media content will not be scanned
media content sent by members without roles will be scanned
media content sent by all members will be scanned

MFA Level.description: guild has no MFA/2FA requirement for moderation actions
guild has a 2FA requirement for moderation actions

Verification Level.description: must have verified email on account
must be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes
must be a member of the server for longer than 10 minutes
must have a verified phone number

Premium Tier.description: guild has not unlocked any Server Boost perks
guild has unlocked Server Boost level 1 perks
guild has unlocked Server Boost level 2 perks
guild has unlocked Server Boost level 3 perks

System Channel Flags.description: Hide member join sticker reply buttons

Guild Features.description: guild has access to set an animated guild banner image
guild has access to set an animated guild icon
guild has set up auto moderation rules
guild has access to set a guild banner image
guild can enable welcome screen, Membership Screening, stage channels and discovery, and receives community updates
guild is able to be discovered in the directory
guild is able to be featured in the directory
guild has access to set an invite splash background
guild has enabled Membership Screening
guild has enabled monetization
guild has increased custom sticker slots
guild has access to create news channels
guild is partnered
guild can be previewed before joining via Membership Screening or the directory
guild has access to create private threads
guild is able to set role icons
guild has enabled ticketed events
guild has access to set a vanity URL
guild is verified
guild has access to set 384kbps bitrate in voice (previously VIP voice servers)
guild has enabled the welcome screen

Response Body.description: a thread member object for each returned thread the current user has joined

Widget Style Options.description: shield style widget with Discord icon and guild members online count
large image with guild icon, name and online count. "POWERED BY DISCORD" as the footer of the widget
smaller widget style with guild icon, name and online count. Split on the right with Discord logo
large image with guild icon, name and online count. In the footer, Discord logo on the left and "Chat Now" on the right
large Discord logo at the top of the widget. Guild icon, name and online count in the middle portion of the widget and a "JOIN MY SERVER" button at the bottom
